title: #262 - Jair Rodriguez, LeeAnn Kreischer, & ME
description:
My wife LeeAnn and I sit down with behavior analyst Jair Rodriguez to talk about our behavior assessment test results. We go into great detail about what makes us act the way we do. I highly recommend doing this for anyone who wants to learn more about who they are and why they are the way they are.
Right now our listeners can get $50 off their behavior assessment test and debrief with Jair Rodriguez by going to one of these links and typing in the coupon code "bertcast".

Both links will have a "coupon code" that you can use. If you don't place the code into the coupon area you will not receive the discount. 

1. This is the link to the Full Executive Summary: https://behavioralresourcegroup.samcart.com/products/the-full-executive-summary-as-heard-on-bertcast/

2. This is the link to Full Behavioral & Motivational Analysis: https://behavioralresourcegroup.samcart.com/products/full-behavioral-analysis-as-heard-on-bertcast/

To donate to Georgia, Gabby, and Tatum’s goal of installing refillable water bottle stations in their middle school please go to http://www.gofundme.com/troop13376silveraward

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
